summary: Implemented a new Home button in the TopBar that uses pointer events and clears the persisted intake session state before navigating to "/". No clear missing parts for REQ-80/REQ-81 are evident from the provided diff summary, but the diff summary also suggests additional unrelated changes may have been made elsewhere.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to audio playback reliability (iPad/Safari play() retry logic, error typing, canplay gating)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; non-goals specify not changing module content/playback behavior as part of this request.

hallucinated_features.description: Cinema-related query error handling / fallback behavior changes (useGetEnabledOTTProviders exposing error state)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; outside scope of adding a Home control and resetting intake state.

hallucinated_features.description: Dashboard adds a new local display mode toggle that syncs with TopBar toggle
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; explicitly listed as a non-goal to not change display-mode toggle behavior (beyond ensuring the new Home control is distinct and reliable).

hallucinated_features.description: Audio Pharmacy module changes to connect to global playback state and modify Now Playing to use PlaybackContext instead of a local player
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; outside the requested Home navigation/reset behavior and conflicts with the non-goal about not changing module content/playback behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: GlassTile accessibility enhancements (focus-visible ring styles, active state feedback, keyboard navigation)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of adding a Home button and resetting intake state.

hallucinated_features.description: EmergencyTalkBar API/behavior changes (new bottomOffset prop and stacking coordination)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to Home navigation and intake reset.
